theme: On The Go In The City
books: The Train Rolls On by Jodi Adams
Monsters On the Bus by Sarah Tabor
Fox and the Bike Ride by Corey Wittler
The Vehicles of the Town by Jolas
letters_numbers: Building letter G with wooden pieces
Story with words starting with G
activities: Make bikes with toilet paper rolls and straws
Draw train tracks and glue train cars
Decorate bikes with sequins and crayons
Create stop light crafts with colored circles
Match cars to parking spots by number
Train car math with counting and sets
focus_skills: Using materials with safety and respect
sensory: Corn kernels, train tracks, trains, small cups, scoopers
raw_excerpt: CHICAGO CONTEMPORARY PRESCHOOL Classroom: Pre-K Week of: November 3-7 Weekly Theme: On The Go In The City Sensory Table: The sensory table will have corn kernels, train tracks, trains, small cups, and scoopers.
